item.title: List of admonitions for wonyoungjang.org
item.author:
contact@wonyoungjang.org
(Wonyoung Jang)
item.description: What an admonition is link h2 An admonition is a special callout or highlighted section on a webpage used to draw attention to important information. It typically contains: A distinctive visual style (e.g., colored background, border, or icon) A label indicating the type of information (e.g., “Note”, “Warning”, “Tip”) Content that needs emphasis or special consideration Admonitions are commonly used in documentation, tutorials, and informational websites to highlight key points, cautions, or additional details.

item.title: List of keyboard shortcuts for wonyoungjang.org
item.author:
contact@wonyoungjang.org
(Wonyoung Jang)
item.description: Navigation link h2 ALT+SHIFT+h → Go to home page ALT+SHIFT+g → Go back to top ALT+SHIFT+s → Go to search page ALT+SHIFT+r → Go to random page ALT+SHIFT+p → Go to previous page ALT+SHIFT+n → Go to next page Appearance link h2 ALT+SHIFT+t → Toggle light/dark themes
